original: intros xs y. split. - intros H. split. + induction xs. * simpl. apply provable_multi_imp_reflexive. * simpl in H. apply deduction_modus_ponens with (x := a). apply IHxs. apply H. apply provable_multi_imp_adjoint_iter. + apply deduction_modus_ponens with (x := multi_imp xs y). apply multi_imp_spec. apply deduction_theorem_multi_imp with (xs := xs). intros x Hx. apply provable_multi_imp_weaken. apply Hx. apply multi_and_spec. apply H. - intros H. apply deduction_theorem_multi_imp with (xs := xs). intros x Hx. apply multi_imp_spec. apply H. apply multi_and_spec. apply Hx.
